scripts.start-server: cd server; webpack; cd ..; node --enable-source-maps server --logTo=test.log --logLevel=4 --dbLogLevel=4
scripts.test: cd server; webpack; cd ../test; webpack; cd ..; node --enable-source-maps test
scripts.test-and-deploy: cd server; webpack; cd ../test; webpack; cd ..; node --enable-source-maps test -v --deploy
